name: Grim Tales: The Wishes Collector's Edition
description: Be careful what you wish for... A deadly bargain has been made, and it's up to you to set things right before your nephew pays the terrible price!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7 Processor: 2.5 GHZ Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 991 MB available space
